short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Global is an ideal tool to monitor browser and device performance.Control fast loading, low memory usage,and more with its features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Computer Hardware and Performance Information This plugin provides users with detailed information about their computer's hardware components, helping them understand their performance.
